text: Leopold Novak (born 3 December 1990) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a defender for NK Vitez. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:NK Hrvatski Dragovoljac players Category:NK Lučko players Category:HNK Cibalia players Category:Sint-Truidense V.V. players Category:NK Zagreb players Category:SR Brașov players Category:NK Vitez players Category:ACS Poli Timișoara players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Liga I players Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Association football defenders
title: Leopold Novak
